summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Twenty-sixth Avenue North and Twenty-eighth Avenue North, each from East Madison Street to East Helen Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing a sixteen (16) foot plank roadway thereon, in accordance with Resolution No. 1708 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
